pages.text: $(bgreen)Cat Tail$() was expected to say Meow like a cat because the word cat is in her name and she also look like a cat ?$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)275$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : She is a $(l)long range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)two thorns$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy. Thorn can $()hits through all enemies$().

$(bpurple)Special :$() Her bullet can $(bred)auto change direction$() for the first hit. She can Attack $(bred)fly target$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot normal thorn each tick, and several powered thorns.
